trans-unit.source: The source of the event, an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemSelect" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventHandler> delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventHandler>委托<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件，需要标识处理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>控件生成项事件时通知该处理程序。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。
